AUTHOR: CalebJ
NAME: Watchdog
SHORT: Interacts with a systemd watchdog to ensure bot is up and connected at all times.
DESCRIPTION:
This cog is for linux systems with a systemd init.
Use the included service template to run Red with the required watchdog settings.
This cog will interface with systemd and 'pet' the watchdog each time it recieves a heartbeat from Discord. This is to ensure a working and authenticated websocket connection.
If the watchdog times out, Red is restarted automatically.
